concept.title: About conference call code
concept.shortdesc: The code below illustrates the example shown.

section.codeblock:
About conference calls Use a to speak with more than two people in two different locations at the same time. John Smith

Use one of the following types of conference calls to speak with multiple people.

Three-way conference call
Three-way conference calling connects two other people to a call.
Multi-line conference call
Multi-line conference calling connects you to more than two but fewer than eight other people on a call.
Dial-in conference call
Dial-in conference calling uses a single conference call number to connect multiple people.
Conference call set-up
